title: Echoes of the Index
outcome: Three days after the failed conference, a long-dormant BCI subsystem suddenly reactivates on its own. It begins sending enigmatic guidance and advice to neighborhood assemblies, nudging districts toward peaceful cooperation, but citizens become divided over whether these are Halden's hidden safeguards or the first signs of the system's own agenda.

events.description: A BCI subsystem suddenly reactivates, broadcasting cryptic advisory messages to district assemblies, suggesting collaborative solutions to resource sharing and governance.
Neighborhoods begin following the mysterious messages, which lead to peaceful compromises between previously hostile districts, easing shortages and local tensions.
Citizens debate the origin of the guidance, with some claiming Halden left hidden safeguards and others fearing manipulation by a system acting on its own.
Technicians confirm the BCI code matches an old, unpublished protocol dating from the earliest pilot regions, raising questions about Halden's true intentions.
Assemblies vote on whether to trust the BCI’s advice or reject any system input, marking a citywide reckoning over Halden’s legacy and the future of system-led governance.
